title: Tattoodo - Tattoo Design
description:
Browse millions of tattoo ideas & book your next ink with Tattoodo 🔥
Tattoodo is the first booking platform for tattoos. Get inspired by tattoo design from 600,000+ artists and 25,000+ studios from around the globe. With the Tattoodo tattoo app, you can book your next appointment in a few easy swipes and get inked by your favorite tattoo artist. Or, let us match you with a tattoo artist, whether you’re at home or traveling the world.
FEATURES FOR CLIENTS
Whether you're looking for minimalistic or traditional tattoos - with our tattoo app you browse tattoo ideas in all styles.
★ Browse millions of tattoos and save your favorite tattoo ideas: search by tattoo design, styles, fonts, and motifs.
★ Connect with top artists and studios: like and follow the profiles of your favorite artists around the world.
★ Book your next tattoo: submit your tattoo ideas to contact multiple artists in your area, or book directly with your favorite tattoo artist within the app!
FEATURES FOR ARTISTS
Tattoodo is the biggest tattoo app for talented artists and makes it possible to show their tattoo design to millions of clients with a passion for tattoos.
★ Get your bookings in one place: receive bookings on Tattoodo and integrate with your social media to turn followers into bookings.
★ Save time communicating with clients: send quick replies, schedule appointments and request deposits & payments.
★ Premium profile placement: get 10x more exposure to relevant clients from placements in searches for styles, artists, and tattoos.
★ Connect with potential clients: get real-time notifications and connect with clients who submit requests in the cities you want.
Get a 30-day free trial of Tattoodo Pro and start building a better business and audience for your incredible tattoo design.
POPULAR STUDIOS & CITIES
NEW YORK - Featuring some of the most sought after tattoo artists in the world, Kings Avenue Tattoo in SOHO is equal part past and future.
MIAMI - Owned by Ami James and featuring other famous tattoo artists, Miami Ink accepts bookings from 2 weeks up to 6 months in advance.
AMSTERDAM -  Founded by watercolor master Jay Freestyle, Freedom & Flesh is a fusion tattoo shop located at the Singel in the Canal District in the center of Amsterdam.
Download the #1 tattoo app!
